column2: names <- as_labeller(c(`amblyrhynchos` = "C. amblyrhynchos", `ferrugineus` = "N. ferrugineus",`melanopterus` = "C. melanopterus", `obesus` = "T. obesus"))
ggtitle("\n\nSum of mean maxN across species") +
labs(x= "Region", y="Sum of mean maxN (+/- SE)")
`summarise()` has grouped output by 'Region'. You can override using the `.groups` argument.
